review: Faster than our game systems for accessing netflix and whatnot. Great size to bring on work travel and use on hotel TVs. It may be less useful if you have a smart TV with all sorts of apps built in, but it works great on ours. One issue that i'm fairly certain is our tv's issue: even if the stick is set to "sleep" the TV still thinks it's getting data and doesn't go to sleep the way it normally would if you had the input set to a cablebox or game console that was off.
